body: Find out more about the content of the "Kentico MVC - Builders" module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course
pageBody: Find out more about the content of the "Kentico MVC - Builders" module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course

body: Meet page builder and form builder. The Kentico 12 features that put great freedom in the hands of content editors, without compromising the clean architecture of ASP.NET MVC.
pageBody: Meet page builder and form builder. The Kentico 12 features that put great freedom in the hands of content editors, without compromising the clean architecture of ASP.NET MVC.
displayTitle: Introduction to page builder and form builder

body: Get bootstrapped into page builder and form builder. Find out what they’re good for, what their inner parts are and what role they play in the bigger picture of Kentico MVC builders.
pageBody: Get bootstrapped into page builder and form builder. Find out what they’re good for, what their inner parts are and what role they play in the bigger picture of Kentico MVC builders.
displayTitle: Page builder and form builder overview

body: Put theory into practice in this page by creating a minimum required set of components that make page builder work.
pageBody: Put theory into practice in this page by creating a minimum required set of components that make page builder work.

body: Unleash the full power of page builder in this page. Build two advanced widgets for your landing page.
pageBody: Unleash the full power of page builder in this page. Build two advanced widgets for your landing page.

body: Learn about the advanced features that make managing content with the page builder even easier.
pageBody: Learn about the advanced features that make managing content with the page builder even easier.

body: Refresh and broaden your theoretical knowledge from the initial pages of this course. Dive deeper into the internals of the form builder.
pageBody: Refresh and broaden your theoretical knowledge from the initial pages of this course. Dive deeper into the internals of the form builder.

body: Put the theory learned in the previous page into practice by creating form components and a validation rule for the Medio Clinic website.
pageBody: Put the theory learned in the previous page into practice by creating form components and a validation rule for the Medio Clinic website.
displayTitle: Creating a form component, validation rule

body: Get guidance to render basic Kentico forms in case using page builder is undesired in the project.
pageBody: Get guidance to render basic Kentico forms in case using page builder is undesired in the project.

body: Before you finish the course, get a quick refresher on performance optimization.
pageBody: Before you finish the course, get a quick refresher on performance optimization.
